greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = floor(n/S2(n)), where S2(n) is the binary weight of n.
mathematica: Table[Floor[n/First@ DigitCount[#, 2] &@ n], {n, 79}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Nov 30 2015 *)
results.author: _Ctibor O. Zizka_, Mar 02 2008
